thread.title: Report: Islamic State Bomb Expert Blows Himself Up in ‘Work Accident’
thread.title_full: Report: Islamic State Bomb Expert Blows Himself Up in ‘Work Accident’

author: breitbart.com
title: Report: Islamic State Bomb Expert Blows Himself Up in ‘Work Accident’
text:
Report: Islamic State Bomb Expert Blows Himself Up in ‘Work Accident’ AHMAD AL-RUBAYE/AFP/Getty by Breitbart Jerusalem 3 Feb 2017 0
3 Feb, 2017 3
Ynetnews reports: Senior ISIS leader Abu Abdullah was recently killed in a “work accident” when he was trying to rig a bomb on a roadside in southern Mosul and the device accidentally went off. A fellow member of the Sunni terrorist organization was also killed in the explosion. Described as a bomb expert, Abdullah was a second-tier leader in the terrorist organization and had previously been responsible for dozens of detonations.
He was renowned for rigging buildings with detonation devices as the terror cell tried to inflict as much damage as possible while they are being forced out of Mosul by the Iraqi army backed by the US-led coalition.
Read more here .
 Breitbart Jerusalem Weird News , Abu Abdullah , Iraqi army , Islamic State , jihad , Mosul , roadside bombs , Sunni terrorist , US-led coalition
